synopsis.text: Juice up for a thrilling ride as we follow the journey of Mix JUICE, an unpopular idol group comprised of four former singers from different genres! The group, which includes Sakura, Himawari, Ayame, and Yuri, is desperate for a break when their manager lands them an unusual gig: becoming test subjects for a young genius scientist named Tsukumo Susumu. Despite being only 13 years old, Susumu is well-versed in aerodynamics and has a wild ambition to travel to the moon without using conventional fossil fuels. Mix JUICE and Susumu embark on a mission filled with wacky inventions and crazy ideas, all in the hopes of holding the first-ever concert on the moon's surface. Will these musical misfits defy the odds and make history, or will their dreams come crashing down to Earth? Join Mix JUICE and Susumu on their lunar adventure and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
